titles: The Devil pursued, or, the The Right saddle laid upon the right Mare a satyr upon Madam Celliers standing in the pillory : being convicted for the publishing of a late lying scandalous pamphlet called Malice defeated &c. / by a person of quality.
author: Person of quality.
notes: Imperfect: creased and torn, with slight loss of print.
